mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attach( attach_no, attach_name, attach_original_name, attach_size, attach_fancy_size, attach_type, attach_path )VALUES( attach_seq.nextval, #{attachName}, #{attachOriginalName}, #{attachSize}, #{attachFancySize}, #{attachType}, #{attachPath} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.attach_no, a.attach_name, a.attach_original_name, a.attach_size, a.attach_fancy_size, a.attach_type, a.attach_path FROM attach a JOIN notice_attach na ON a.attach_no = na.attach_no WHERE 1=1 AND na.notice_no = #{noticeNo}
SELECT attach_no FROM attach WHERE attach_name = #{attachName}
